div.p: Forward (blue arrows) and reverse sweeps (green arrows) in conductance G (in units of 2e 2 /h) plots for QPCs 1 through 3. Although the individual pinch-off voltage for each QPC channel is different from one another, the range of common gate signal (V G) is kept the same for all devices for clarity. All conductance measurements were taken at T = 4.2 K. V G is the common mode voltage superimposed on initial side gate potentials V G1 and V G2 applied to generate the asymmetric potential energy profile in the narrow portion of the QPC.
